<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check unit rating. Rating is increased for killing enemies, decreased for killing friendlies (see [[ArmA:_Rating Values|Rating Values]]). Can be changed via [[addRating]] by the mission designer. 

The rating of the player is displayed as the "score" at the end of the mission. Via [[Description.ext]] one can define how many points it takes to get a perfect score, as well as the number of stars.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''rating''' unitName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_score <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''rating''' [[player]] </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Side relations]], [[ArmA: Rating Values]], [[addRating]], [[rank]], [[setUnitRank]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
